document.docAuthor: Saturnino, Regiane, Tourinho, Ana Lúcia, Azevedo, Clarissa Salette De, Baptista, Renner L. C. & Magalhães, Célio
document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of type specimens of invertebrates in the collection of the Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas da Amazônia, Manaus, Brazil. V. Arachnida: Araneae, Opiliones and Scorpiones

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of type specimens of invertebrates in the collection of the Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas da Amazônia, Manaus, Brazil. V. Arachnida: Araneae, Opiliones and Scorpiones

subSubSection.paragraph:
Holotype : Male, INPA-AR 1333 , Brazil , Amazonas, Manaus, Reserva Ducke (
02° 55 'S
,
59 ° 59 'W
), J. Adis et al. leg.,
21 .II. 1992
. Paratype :
1 female
, INPA-AR 134 , with same data as for holotype .

Holotype : Male, INPA-AR 23 , Brazil , Amazonas, Manaus, Reserva Ducke , H. Höfer and T. Gasnier leg.,
18 .XI. 1991
.

Holotype : Male, INPA-AR 22 , Brazil , Amazonas, 60 km N Manaus, Fazenda Esteio, B.C. Klein leg.,
19 .II. 1986
.
Remark : Holotype damaged; opisthosoma and part of legs missing, but palpus intact.

Holotype : Male, INPA-AR 67 , Brazil , Roraima, ilha de Maracá , rio Uraricoera, A.A. Lise leg.,
24 .III. 1987
. Paratype :
1 female
, INPA-AR 68 , with same data as for holotype .

cravilus Marques & Buckup, 1992 : 55
, figs 1–6 .
Thymoites
Paratype :
2 females
, INPA-AR 69 , Brazil , Roraima, ilha de Maracá , rio Uraricoera, A.A. Lise leg.,
24 .III. 1987
.

Holotype : Male, INPA-AR 19 , Brazil , Roraima, ilha de Maracá , rio Uraricoera, J.A. Rafael leg.,
21–30 .XI. 1987
. Paratypes :
1 female
, INPA-AR 20 , with same data as for holotype ;
1 male
, INPA-AR 2952 , with same data as for holotype .

Holotype : Male, INPA-AR 23 , Brazil , Roraima, ilha de Maracá ,
rio Uraricoera, J.A. Rafael et al.
leg.,
21–30 .XI. 1987
. Paratype :
1 female
, INPA-AR 2951 , with same data as for holotype .

Holotype : Male, INPA-AR 17 , Brazil , Amazonas, Manaus, Reserva Ducke , J. Vidal leg.,
18 .XII. 1987
. Paratypes :
2 females
, INPA-AR 113 , with same data as for holotype .

Holotype : Female, INPA-AR 18 , Brazil , Amazonas, Manaus, Reserva Ducke , J. Vidal leg.,
04.VIII. 1987
.

Currently
Cryptachaea pydanieli (
Buckup & Marques, 1991
)
: Yoshida, 2008 : 39 .

Holotype : Male, INPA-AR 24 , Brazil , Roraima, ilha de Maracá , rio Uraricoera, A.A. Lise leg.,
04.XII. 1987
. Paratypes :
1 female
, INPA-AR 25 , with same data as for holotype ; female, INPA-AR 26 , with same locality as for holotype , E.H. Buckup leg,
05.XII. 1987
.

Holotype : Male, INPA-AR 2949 , Brazil , Amazonas, Manaus, Reserva Ducke , H. Höfer leg.,
20 .VIII. 1991
. Paratype :
1 male
, INPA-AR 2950 , Amazonas, without specific locality data, probably same as in holotype (
Marques & Buckup, 1997
).
